review: This does everything that it says it will! Love the Amazon Fire TV Stick. We are cancelling our satellite and just going with this and hulu/netflix and saving $160 a month! author: Amazon Customer

review: I purchased two fire sticks for two separate rooms in my house, one which is fairly close to my router. I AFTS is constantly freezing and dropping on and off of the internet even when I have a good signal. Many times Apps cannot be opened and I have to constantly restart the device. It has gone entire days without picking up on a signal. All other devices in the home run fine on the WiFi. I have tried all of the troubleshooting suggestions that i could find online but to no avail. Back to the laptop...such a disappointment!
